prompts.prompt: Create a well styled and beautiful component that lists the comments on a given jira issue. Add a fetch button that fetches the comments for the issue. Use any relevant api or package to connect with jira. Also add a plus button that allows adding a new comment. Add proper error and null handling. Use the jira package https://www.npmjs.com/package/jira-client jira-client package version 8.2.2 Do not include comments in package.json

add the component in the index page. Also add error handling in the component.
Add unit tests.

Add comment should open up a textbox where user can enter their comment. Once the user submits the new comment, it should convert the string to Atlassian Document Format format before submitting it to the Jira API to add the new comment.
